executable.title: PET phantom detector CLI
executable.description: Detects positions of PET/CT pocket phantoms in PET image.

integer-enumeration.label: SpheresPerPhantom
integer-enumeration.description: What kind of phantom are we working with here?

double.label: MinimumSphereActivity
double.description: Used for thresholding in blob detection. Unit: becquerels per milliliter [Bq/ml]

double.label: MaximumLineStraightnessDeviation
double.description: Used for eliminating detections which are not in a straight line. Unit: multiples of geometric average of voxel spacing

double.label: MinimumRadius
double.description: Used for eliminating too small blobs. Unit: millimeter [mm]

double.label: MaximumRadius
double.description: Used for eliminating too big blobs. Unit: millimeter [mm]

double.label: MinimumSphereDistance
double.description: Signifies minimum distance between adjacent sphere centers [mm]. Used to separate phantoms from tumors.

double.label: MaximumSphereDistance
double.description: Signifies maximum distance between adjacent sphere centers [mm]. Used to separate phantoms from tumors.

boolean.label: StrictSorting
boolean.description: Controls whether spheres within a phantom must have descending activities. If OFF, they can have approximately same activities (within 15%).

pointfile.label: DetectedPoints
pointfile.description: Fiducial points, one for each detected sphere. Will be multiple of 3.
